channel.title: How to change Home Teleport

item.title: How to change Home Teleport
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

when u go into clicking buttons go ctrl f and search home like i do here

//home teleports
case 4171:

		case 50056:
		String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient";
		c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3498, 0, type);	
		break;

were the (3087, 3498, 0, type); u change the 3087 & the 3498 to were u wont ur home to be that 3087 , 3498 is the right x and y cords for edge

Read full topic

item.title: How to change Home Teleport
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

[code]//home teleports
case 4171:
case 50056:
case 117048:
String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? “modern” : “ancient”;
c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0, type);
break;

		case 117112:
		case 50235:
		case 4140:
		//c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.LUMBY_X, Config.LUMBY_Y, 0, "modern");
		c.getDH().sendOption5("cockroaches", "Taverly Dungeon", "Slayer Tower", "Brimhaven Dungeon", "Elemental Pods");
		c.teleAction = 1;
		break;

		case 117123:
		case 4143:
		case 50245:
		c.getDH().sendOption5("Barrows", "Pest Control", "Tzhaar", "Duel Arena", "BattleGrounds");
		c.teleAction = 2;
		break;[/code]

Dont know whether thats the right thing. Would i have to change it?

At the moment i am using hybrid PVP V.2, the home is no where near edgeville and i would like to change it to edgeville

Please can you tell me what i have to change in clickingbuttons.

Thanks

-Elliot
